ï»¿00OCLAMNIN RECOMMENDATION OF STATUTORY COMMITTEE TO: The President, International Development Association Recommendation of the Co nmittee under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement on the proposed Grant (Central Asia South Asia Electricity Transmission and Trade Project) to the Republic of Tajikistan The undersigned Committee constituted under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of International Developm -nt Association (the Association) hereby submits its recommendation pursuant to said Section in respect of t ie proposal that the Association provide to the Republic of Tajikistan (the Recipient) a grant in an amount equivalent to twenty-nine million four hundred thousand Special Drawing Rights (SDR 29,400,000). The purpose of said grant is to create the conditions for sustainable electricity trade between the Central Asian countries of Tajikistan and Kyrgyzstan and the South Asian countries of Afghanistan and Pakistan. 1. The Committee has carefully 3tudied the merits of the proposal to provide such a grant, and of the purpose to which the proceeds of the g -ant are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of the opini)n that the project toward the financing of which the proceeds of such grant are to be applied comes within tie purposes of the Association as set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and that said project i! designed to promote the economic development of the Republic of Tajikistan and is of high development I priority in the light of the needs of the Republic of Tajikistan.
ï»¿-2- (REPUBLIC OF TAJIKISTAN) (Central Asia South Asia Electricity Transmission and Trade Project) 3. Accordingly, the Committee finds that said project merits financial assistance from the Association, and hereby recommends said project for such assistance. COMMITTEE Senior Vice Presidet and Group General Counsel Nominee selected by Governor for the Republic of Tajikistan n ice President South Asia S Dated at Washington, D.C.
